subject: Order #SSN1771 – Package Not Delivered
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support Team,



I am contacting you regarding my order #SSN1771, placed on June 17th, 2025.



According to the tracking information, the package is currently marked as “object not located in the postal flow”. Today is August 27th, 2025, and the order has still not been delivered, well beyond the estimated delivery time provided.



Could you please check what can be done in this situation? Since the delivery deadline has been largely exceeded and the package was not located, I would like to know what solutions you can offer.



I look forward to your urgent response.



Kind regards,

Sebastião

Hello, the carrier has reported that your package delivery failed. Please contact your local carrier BR CORREIOS to arrange for redelivery. Here is your tracking number: ND639510831BR  Please verify that your address information is correct:  Sebastião Ferreira  Rua Natal, 50 - Bairro Dom Lustosa  60526-145 Fortaleza CE  Brazil

Dear Simsonn Support,



I am contacting you again regarding my order #SSN1771.



I would like to clarify that the issue is not related to a failed delivery attempt, as mentioned in your previous email. There has been no delivery attempt at all.



According to the official tracking information (ND639510831BR), the current status is:

“Objeto não localizado no fluxo postal” – which translates to “Item not located within the postal flow”, meaning the package has been lost within the postal system.



I have already contacted Brazil Post (Correios), and they confirmed that the package could not be located. Therefore, the information I received from you does not match the actual tracking status.



Additionally, you asked me to verify my delivery address. I have checked it carefully, and I confirm that the address provided in the order is correct.



At this point, the estimated delivery timeframe provided by both Brazil Post and Simsonn has been significantly exceeded. Given this delay and the confirmation that the package is missing, I kindly request that you urgently inform me how we can resolve this situation.



I am attaching the updated tracking screenshot for your reference and expect your prompt reply.



Best regards,

Sebastião Ferreira

Hello,



I have just received my order #SSN1771, and unfortunately, it arrived incomplete — the Plus X Pedal Control Box was missing. This component is essential for the system to work, and I cannot use the product without it.



After so many issues, delays, and mistakes from the beginning of this purchase, I was already deeply frustrated. Now, to finally receive the package missing a critical part is simply unacceptable.



At this point, I do not wish to receive another shipment. I am extremely disappointed with how this order has been handled from start to finish. I kindly request one of the following resolutions:



A full refund for the order, or
The option to return the entire product and receive a full refund.




I’ve attached photos clearly showing the missing item and the product listing that confirms it should have been included.



Please let me know how we can move forward promptly. I expect a serious and effective resolution.



Sincerely,

Sebastião Ferreira
